author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

In PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/43164 changes in the EGM code were introduced to allow the HCAL PF cuts to be taken from DB on demand (i.e., for specific workflows) in alternative to being taken from config files. 
In the `EgammaHLTHcalVarProducerFromRecHit` changeset it was overlooked that that module is an `edm::global::EDProducer` hence the newly introduced `beginRun` (to consume `HCalPFCuts`) cannot be `override`-n (as it's not in the base class). Thus it was never called, resulting in not reading the Hcal PF thresholds from DB.
Fix implementation follows recommendation at https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/43164#discussion_r1471788540.
  
#### PR validation:

`cmssw` compiles. Private validation from @RSalvatico
